description: Making decisions is part of everyday life.  And whether we think about it or not we’re constantly weighing out the pros and cons of each decision we make.  For example should I buy a new computer; sell my car; ask her out on a date; or get the latest phone. Major or minor decisions shouldn’t be left up to chance. And now they don’t have to. With the new Pros & Cons app easily accessible on your phone, you can save the pen and paper. Just pull out your phone and make a more informed decision. You can also share your list with others via email for feedback or group decisions. You’ve made the decision on which phone to get, now let your phone help you make the other decisions in your life!
